jasmine

The portlet hub provides JavaScript support for portlets. provides a global namespace of "portlet" 0
The portlet hub provides JavaScript support for portlets. provides a property named "register" in the portlet namespace 0
The portlet hub provides JavaScript support for portlets. the register property in the portlet namespace is a function 0
The portlet hub provides JavaScript support for portlets. The portlet hub register function: throws an IllegalArgumentException if no portlet ID argument is provided 0
The portlet hub provides JavaScript support for portlets. The portlet hub register function: throws an IllegalArgumentException if too many (>1) arguments are provided 0
The portlet hub provides JavaScript support for portlets. The portlet hub register function: throws an IllegalArgumentException if the portlet ID is not a string 0

The portlet hub provides JavaScript support for portlets. The portlet hub register function: throws an IllegalArgumentException if the portlet ID is not defined for the portlet hub 0
The portlet hub provides JavaScript support for portlets. The portlet hub register function: does not throw an exception if the portlet ID is valid 0
The portlet hub provides JavaScript support for portlets. The portlet hub register function: returns an object when provided with a valid portlet ID 0
The portlet hub provides JavaScript support for portlets. The portlet hub register function: returns a PortletInit object containing a "portletModes" property 0
The portlet hub provides JavaScript support for portlets. The portlet hub register function: returns PortletInit.portletModes equal to the test data 0
